name: Chosen Ostrich
description:
Ostriches have always been the Chosen of the Gods. A volcano threatens their serene existence, and divine intervention is all that can save them. Use the powers of wind, fire, rain, and thunder to protect the birds from falling rocks. Juggle all abilities at once or test your skills with one. Great One, save the Chosen!

Control the game with the mouse!

Thanks for playing! Contact me at @snicklodocus or @nedmakesgames. Watch me make games live on Twitch! Thank you!
